Example 2 (treatment contraindicated): ECO:0006016 (author statement from published clinical study)

Example 1 (treatment): Fluoxetine is a serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor that also has been found to decrease channel-opening duration and in this study is used off-label for patients with slow-channel CMS.
Example 2 (treatment contraindicated): Fluoxetine use in patients with fast-channel CMS
column4: in whom channel-opening duration is already too short
